alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 24 at 8:17PM MST until February 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SATURDAY THROUGH 5 PM MST SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 MPH with gusts up to 60 MPH possible. Blowing snow may create visibility reductions less than one mile at times. * WHERE...South Laramie Range, South Laramie Range Foothills, and Central Laramie County including the Interstate 80 between Cheyenne and Laramie. * WHEN...From 5 AM Saturday through 5 PM MST Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
